sections.text:
72-221.School lands; acquisition for public highway.

The Department of Transportation and the county board of any county may acquire land necessary to establish a public highway over or across any educational lands.

SourceLaws 1907, c. 134, § 1, p. 437;Laws 1913, c. 40, § 1, p. 135;R.S.1913, § 5855;Laws 1915, c. 103, § 1, p. 247;Laws 1921, c. 80, § 2, p. 290;C.S.1922, § 5191;Laws 1923, c. 61, § 1, p. 185;Laws 1925, c. 135, § 1, p. 354;Laws 1929, c. 188, § 1, p. 652;C.S.1929, § 72-211;Laws 1931, c. 118, § 1, p. 345;Laws 1935, c. 164, § 1, p. 611;Laws 1941, c. 145, § 1, p. 576;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 72-211;Laws 1943, c. 160, § 1, p. 574;R.S.1943, § 72-221;Laws 2017, LB339, § 247.
